name: Quadrilateral seesaw
description:
A short game made for Geo Jam 2022. The Aim of the game is to not fall off the randomly generated quadrilateral shape while having circles falling from the sky. I apologise in advance for the annoying music.

Instruction

  • when the game starts simply select the side you want to start on by pressing its corresponding letter on the keyboard
  • Once the shape has rotated to the correct orientation your player will spawn in. use A and D to move the player.
  • Once the player has been spawned balls will start falling from the sky in an attempt to make you fall off the island.
  • You get points whenever a ball hits your island and you lose when you fall off the island,
